label: Precipice of Origin
description: From this album's inception, I had planned to include two transition tracks that would lead into and out of Midten, which I've now released separately. Despite this, I still liked the idea of transitioning into two halves of the album, ideally through minimalistic tracks. This resulted in such a simple yet ambient song.
why: A calming melody with an epic chorus. Despite its simplicity, this track went through many hours of slight tweaks in order to make each instrument intertwined.
